scripts.start:vue: tsc && concurrently "cross-env STAGE=development FRAME=vue electron ." "cd web-vue && npm run serve"
scripts.start:react: tsc && concurrently "cross-env STAGE=development FRAME=react electron ." "cd web && npm run dev"
scripts.pack:vue: tsc && cd web-vue && npm run build && cd .. && cross-env FRAME=vue electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist:vue: tsc && cd web-vue && npm run build && cd .. && electron-builder
